template.name: pluginheaders
template.value:
/* * Plugin Name: $PLUGIN_NAME$ * Plugin URI: $PLUGIN_URL$ * Description: $DESCRIPTION$ * Version: $VERSION$ * Author: $AUTHOR$ * Author URI: $AUTHOR_URI$ * License: GPL2 * License URI: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html * Text Domain: $TEXT_DOMAIN$ * Domain Path: /languages */
$END$

template.name: themeheaders
template.value:
/* * Theme Name: $THEME_NAME$ * Theme URI: $THEME_URI$ * Author: $AUTHOR$ * Author URI: $AUTHOR_URI$ * Description: $DESCRIPTION$ * Version: $VERSION$ * License: GNU General Public License v2 or later * License URI: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html * Tags: $TAGS$ * Text Domain: $TEXT_DOMAIN$ * Domain Path: /languages * Template: $TEMPLATE$ */
$END$

template.name: register_post_type
template.value: register_post_type( '$POST_TYPE$', array( 'label' => esc_html__( '$Plural$', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'labels' => array( 'name' => esc_html_x( '$Plural$', 'post type general name', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'singular_name' => esc_html_x( '$Singular$', 'post type singular name', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'add_new' => esc_html_x( 'Add New', '$singular$', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'add_new_item' => esc_html__( 'Add New $Singular$', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'edit_item' => esc_html__( 'Edit $Singular$', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'new_item' => esc_html__( 'New $Singular$', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'view_item' => esc_html__( 'View $Singular$', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'view_items' => esc_html__( 'View $Plural$', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'search_items' => esc_html__( 'Search $Plural$', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'not_found' => esc_html__( 'No $plural$ found.', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'not_found_in_trash' => esc_html__( 'No $plural$ found in Trash.', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'parent_item_colon' => esc_html__( 'Parent $Singular$:', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), // Hierarchical only 'all_items' => esc_html__( 'All $Plural$', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'archives' => esc_html__( '$Singular$ Archives', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'attributes' => esc_html__( '$Singular$ Attributes', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), // Post type must support 'page-attributes' 'insert_into_item' => esc_html__( 'Insert into $singular$', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'upload_to_this_item' => esc_html__( 'Uploaded to this $singular$', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'featured_image' => esc_html__( 'Featured Image', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'set_featured_image' => esc_html__( 'Set featured image', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'remove_featured_image' => esc_html__( 'Remove featured image', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'use_featured_image' => esc_html__( 'Use featured image', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'menu_name' => esc_html_x( '$Plural$', 'admin menu', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), // Default is value of 'name' 'filter_items_list' => esc_html__( 'Filter $plural$ list', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'items_list_navigation' => esc_html__( '$Plural$ list navigation', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'items_list' => esc_html__( '$Plural$ list', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'name_admin_bar' => esc_html_x( '$Singular$', 'add new on admin bar', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), // Defaults to `singular_name` ), 'description' => esc_html__( '$DESCRIPTION$', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'public' => true, 'hierarchical' => false, 'has_archive' => true, 'exclude_from_search' => false, // Default is opposite of 'public' 'publicly_queryable' => true, // Default is value of 'public' 'show_ui' => true, // Default is value of 'public' 'show_in_nav_menus' => true, // Default is value of 'public' 'show_in_menu' => true, // Default is value of 'show_ui' 'show_in_admin_bar' => true, // Default is value of 'show_in_menu' 'menu_position' => null, // Integer (optional) 'menu_icon' => 'dashicons-admin-post', 'can_export' => true, // Default is true 'delete_with_user' => false, 'show_in_rest' => false, 'rest_base' => '$plural$', 'rewrite' => array( 'slug' => '$plural$', 'with_front' => false, ), 'supports' => array( 'title', 'editor', 'author', 'thumbnail', 'excerpt', 'trackbacks', 'custom-fields', 'comments', 'revisions', 'page-attributes', 'post-formats', ), 'taxonomies' => array(), // Optional ) );
template.description: Register a custom post type in WordPress

template.name: register_taxonomy
template.value: register_taxonomy( '$TAXONOMY$', array(), array( 'labels' => array( 'name' => esc_html_x( '$Plural$', 'taxonomy general name', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'singular_name' => esc_html_x( '$Singular$', 'taxonomy singular name', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'menu_name' => esc_html_x( '$Plural$', 'admin menu', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'all_items' => esc_html__( 'All $Plural$', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'edit_item' => esc_html__( 'Edit $Singular$', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'view_item' => esc_html__( 'View $Singular$', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'update_item' => esc_html__( 'Update $Singular$', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'add_new_item' => esc_html__( 'Add New $Singular$', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'new_item_name' => esc_html__( 'New $Singular$ Name', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'not_found' => esc_html__( 'Not Found', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'no_terms' => esc_html__( 'No $plural$', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'items_list_navigation' => esc_html__( '$Plural$ list navigation', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'items_list' => esc_html__( '$Plural$ list', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'back_to_items' => esc_html__( '$Plural$ list navigation', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'parent_item' => esc_html__( 'Parent $Singular$', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), // Hierarchical only 'parent_item_colon' => esc_html__( 'Parent $Singular$:', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), // Hierarchical only 'most_used' => esc_html__( 'Most Used', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), // Non-hierarchical only 'popular_items' => esc_html__( 'Popular $Plural$', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), // Non-hierarchical only 'separate_items_with_commas' => esc_html__( 'Separate $plural$ with commas', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), // Non-hierarchical only 'add_or_remove_items' => esc_html__( 'Add or remove $plural$', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), // Non-hierarchical only 'choose_from_most_used' => esc_html__( 'Choose from the most used', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), // Non-hierarchical only 'search_items' => esc_html__( 'Search $Plural$', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), ), 'description' => esc_html__( '$DESCRIPTION$', '$TEXT_DOMAIN$' ), 'public' => true, 'publicly_queryable' => true, // Defaults to 'public' 'hierarchical' => false, 'show_ui' => true, // Defaults to 'public' 'show_in_nav_menus' => true, // Defaults to 'public' 'show_in_rest' => false, 'rest_base' => '$plural$', 'show_tagcloud' => true, // Defaults to 'show_ui' 'show_in_quick_edit' => true, // Defaults to 'show_ui' 'show_admin_column' => true, 'rewrite' => array( 'slug' => '$plural$', 'with_front' => false, ), ) );
template.description: Register a custom taxonomy in WordPress
